name: Criosphinx
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.desc: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx’s intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The sphinx’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sphinx makes a ram attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Ram Attack
legendary.desc: The sphinx makes one ram attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
